content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace setup at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0.0, 0.0)) with fuel (coal: 15), currently working with iron-ore (6) to produce iron-plate (100).
- Furnace (position (2.0, 0.0)) with fuel (coal: 11), currently has no ingredients to smelt, producing copper-plate (81).
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 0.5)) containing copper-plate (110).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory of the furnace to confirm it can accept the items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors related to full inventory
- Monitor the inventory space of the furnace and ensure it is not full before inserting more items. If the furnace is full, it will not accept additional materials.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended position.
